Text.Value: Hey again.
This must be the girl, Arabella.

EditorData.NodeContext: Jaheira has heard about this child and her magical prowess - but is seeing her for the first time, standing int he midst of some dead bandits

Text.Value: Detect Arabella's thoughts.
Leave.
Have you been on your own this whole time?
Arabella?
*Arabella's inner voice is quieted by thoughts from the far past. The stone holds records of all those who have passed by it.*
There are corpses everywhere. What happened?
Forget the stone - there are corpses everywhere. What happened?
*Arabella seems not to notice you as you approach. She's as intent on examining a peculiar stone as she is unbothered by the corpses littered on the ground.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [MATV] *REUSE* UND_ExamineAmulet_LOOP_PLYR (if stone is being held) or TUT_Pod_RuneExamine_PLYR
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: We see Arabella studying a stone as we approach. She is surrounded by the corpses of bandits. It's OK to just focus on player here if we can't have the budget to show anything more

Text.Value: Arabella?
What makes this stone so interesting?
Arabella?
Arabella?
Aw, you can't see it? I can. And it's wonderful. I can't describe it - you'd have to see for yourself.
*The stone buzzes with unfamiliar magic.*
Arabella?
Bandits - came at me with daggers. They didn't know who they were messing with.
Check out the stone. It's magic - incredible, right?
And I've only scratched the surface. I want to know everything.
*The stone holds records of all who have passed by it. Arabella is collecting them; it's as natural as breathing for her.*
Study the stone.
Arabella?
Arabella?
Who is this little berserker?

EditorData.NodeContext: Undertone, impressed - we've happened upon Arabella, the child-sorcerer, standing in the midst of a pile of bandit corpses. Minsc is the only one who hasn't met / heard of her, and he's impressed by the amount of enemies she's taken down.

Text.Value: Don't worry about me. I'll be just fine. I'll see you soon enough. Bone man said so.
Arabella?
*You are flooded with memories of the distant past. Creatures slain, lovers reunited, spells crackling through the air.*
Bone Man was right. The Weave will take care of me. I just need to listen.
You're right - that stone is incredible. I saw past events as if I'd been there myself.
Bone Man told me to follow the Weave, to let it guide me. I've learned a lot, thanks to him. And I'm still learning.
Hey! I had a feeling you'd show up. It's sort of our thing. Like it's fate or something.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Arabella turns and notices you, then speaks her line in standar position

Text.Value: I told you. I've learned a lot.
It just looks like a stone to me. What's so special about it?
*Her mind is closed to intruders.*
Yep. And I like it that way.
*The histories flow from Arabella into you. Creatures slain, lovers reunited, spells crackling through the air. The girl is collecting every last vision; it's as natural as breathing for her.*

Synopsis: Arabella is studuing a magical stone - with detect thoughts you get - "You see that she can see the entire history of everyone that passed by here through the stone. It's as natural as breathing to her". There are a bunch of dead bandits around her - they messed with a wrong gal.
